text:
..pressed enter too soon.

I am writing a test case for condition, here is the first bug found

this test
    <condition >
      <equals arg1="a" arg2="a" />
    </condition>

gives this result
condition-incomplete:
[condition] Error in class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.ConditionTask

BUILD FAILED
D:\Java\Ant\jakarta-ant\src\etc\testcases\taskdefs\condition.xml:14: java.lang.
eflect.InvocationTargetException

when it should be saying "you left out property, idiot"
creator: steve_l@iseran.com
steve_l@iseran.com
text:
I think what is happening here is that build exceptions are being nested 
inside invocation exceptions; they need to be teased out and fed upstream. I 
will file the related bug reports as duplicates of the same problem.
*** Bug 5831 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: steve_l@iseran.com
steve_l@iseran.com
text: *** Bug 5832 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
